overview: Cuatro Lonkos is a documentary that shows us the fate of the bodies of great indigenous leaders, icons of the resistance, such as Juan Calfucura, Mariano Rosas and Cipriano Catriel. At the same time, it investigates the mythical story of Vicente Pinc√©n Lonko.
tagline: Mapuche, Tehuelche, indigenous leader, Argentina, History, Rights of aboriginal people.
title: Cuatro Lonkos
